47:   def find_elements(options, show_non_public = false)
48:     if !options[:collection].blank? && options[:collection].is_a?(Array)
49:       all_elements = options[:collection]
50:     else
51:       all_elements = find_selected_elements(options, show_non_public)
52:     end
53:     return all_elements
54:   end
find_selected_elements(options, show_non_public = false)

Finds selected elements from page either except a passed collection or only the passed collection Collection is an array of strings from element names. E.g.: [‘text’, ‘headline’] Returns only public ones

[Source]

    # File app/models/page.rb, line 35
35:   def find_selected_elements(options, show_non_public = false)
36:     public_condition = show_non_public ? nil : ' AND elements.public = 1'
37:     if !options[:except].blank?
38:       condition = ["elements.name NOT IN (?)#{public_condition}", options[:except]]
39:     elsif !options[:only].blank?
40:       condition = ["elements.name IN (?)#{public_condition}", options[:only]]
41:     else
42:       condition = show_non_public.nil? ? nil : {:public => true}
43:     end
44:     return self.elements.find(:all, :conditions => condition, :limit => options[:count], :order => options[:random].blank? ? nil : "RAND()")
45:   end

humanized_status()

Returns the translated explanation of seven the page stati.

[Source]

     # File app/models/page.rb, line 138
138:   def humanized_status
139:     case self.status
140:     when 0
141:       then
142:       return _('page_status_visible_public_locked')
143:     when 1
144:       then
145:       return _('page_status_visible_unpublic_locked')
146:     when 2
147:       then
148:       return _('page_status_invisible_public_locked')
149:     when 3
150:       then
151:       return _('page_status_invisible_unpublic_locked')
152:     when 4
153:       then
154:       return _('page_status_visible_public')
155:     when 5
156:       then
157:       return _('page_status_visible_unpublic')
158:     when 6
159:       then
160:       return _('page_status_invisible_public')
161:     when 7
162:       then
163:       return _('page_status_invisible_unpublic')
164:     end
165:   end

parent_language()

[Source]

     # File app/models/page.rb, line 210
210:   def parent_language
211:     parent = self
212:     while parent.parent && parent.language_root_for.blank?
213:       parent = parent.parent
214:     end
215:     unless parent.blank?
216:       parent_lang = parent.language
217:     else
218:       parent_lang = self.language
219:     end
220:     parent_lang
221:   end

status()

Returns the status code. Used by humanized_status and the page status icon inside the sitemap rendered by Pages.index.

[Source]

     # File app/models/page.rb, line 168
168:   def status
169:     if self.locked
170:       if self.public? && self.visible?
171:         return 0
172:       elsif !self.public? && self.visible?
173:         return 1
174:       elsif self.public? && !self.visible?
175:         return 2
176:       elsif !self.public? && !self.visible?
177:         return 3
178:       end
179:     else
180:       if self.public? && self.visible?
181:         return 4
182:       elsif !self.public? && self.visible?
183:         return 5
184:       elsif self.public? && !self.visible?
185:         return 6
186:       elsif !self.public? && !self.visible?
187:         return 7
188:       end
189:     end
190:   end
